alert.note: Alert for Dunklin (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 10:14PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Greene, northeastern Craighead, northwestern Mississippi and southwestern Dunklin Counties through 1100 PM CDT... At 1014 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cardwell, or 8 miles east of Paragould, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Paragould, Manila, Leachville, Monette, Cardwell, Arbyrd, Black Oak, Jolliff Store, Happy Corners, Delfore, Macey, Schug, Carmi, Bard, Whisp, Buckeye, Arkmo, Walters, Pawheen and Poplar Ridge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
